meta.description: Determine the minimum number of courses a master's student should take to meet category and prerequisite requirements.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a course is taken (1) or not (0).

objective.name: min_total_courses
objective.expr: x['calculus'] + x['operations_research'] + x['data_structures'] + x['management_statistics'] + x['computer_simulation'] + x['computer_programming'] + x['forecasting']
objective.description: Minimize the total number of courses taken.

constraints.name: math_courses
constraints.description: At least two math courses must be taken.

constraints.name: operations_research_courses
constraints.description: At least two operations research courses must be taken.

constraints.name: computer_courses
constraints.description: At least two computer courses must be taken.

constraints.name: prerequisite_computer_simulation
constraints.description: Computer simulation can only be taken if computer programming is taken.

constraints.name: prerequisite_data_structures
constraints.description: Data structures can only be taken if computer programming is taken.

constraints.name: prerequisite_management_statistics
constraints.description: Management statistics can only be taken if calculus is taken.

constraints.name: prerequisite_forecasting
constraints.description: Forecasting can only be taken if management statistics is taken.
